question: ‘Resolution 1373 on counter terrorism’, that is seen in news recently, is associated with which organization?
explanation:
The resolution 1373 on counter terrorism was adopted by the United Nations Security Council unanimously on 28 September 2001. This was adopted following the 11 September terrorist attacks on the United States.
Recently, an open debate was held at the United National Security Council (UNSC) titled '20 years after the adoption of resolution 1373’ that focused on combating terrorism on a globally. India was represented virtually by External affairs Minister Dr.S.Jaishankar.
